wikiData.title: Pennsylvania v. Mimms
wikiData.Prior: 232 Pa. Super. 486, 335 [[A.2d]] 516 (Pa. Super. 1975) (confirming conviction); 471 Pa. 546, 370 A.2d 1157 (Pa. 1977) (reversing superior court)
wikiData.Holding: Officer ordering defendant out of his car following a traffic stop and conducting a pat-down to check for weapons held not to violate the Fourth Amendment, reversing Pennsylvania Supreme Court.
wikiData.LawsApplied: [[Fourth Amendment to the United States Constitution|U.S. Const. amends. IV]], [[Fourteenth Amendment to the United States Constitution|XIV]]
